text:
Please how do I break add a line break? I tried

`<Text variant="microcopy">{item.MAIN_TYPE_TX + "\n"}</Text>`      
 `<Text variant="microcopy">{item.SUB_TYPE_TX} </Text>`
Would love to have this functionality, you could do an href with target blank, that links to the file url and that would start the download. But currently, there isn't a way to do copy to clipboard
Thanks <@U01QVR44MEY> for suggesting the file download solution
you'll want to use the inline prop
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#text>
of course

Thank you. I tried this as the docs says with inline set to `true`, to get a line break, it didn’t work. It sets the line break when you use `false.` 
Maybe some issue with the docs, the example isn’t a line break or does it mean something else in HubSpot?

Anyways, `<Text inline={false}></Text>` gets the job done
Just going to drop this here, <@U03FJQPSC0Y> killed it: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9YbeC027ic0>
good to know, <@U05ENUJF7B5> is this possibly an issue with the docs?

:mega: Magnus (and others on the channel), we would like to understand pain in this area more to find out the right solution. If this is something you feel strongly about, please book 15-20min time on my calendar to talk about it. Also include the non-technical people who are on the team on the call too. <http://meetings.HubSpot.com/sparikh1|meetings.HubSpot.com/sparikh1>
<@U032JBY6BAR>

Yep, good catch <@U03BVLC2LDN> & <@U01QVR44MEY>!

<@U01SJJ8EBFC>, can we update these <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#text|docs> to show that `inline={false}` will insert a line break? Please and thank you!! :HubSpotheart:
Haha I have the same ask.
<@U0616TTM53R> <@U05D3US2RRB>
How are you receiving the value within the serverless function?

.//serverless-function.js
const { hs_object_id } = context.propertiesToSend
Yogesh, on copy to clipboard - what content would be copied to clipboard? Is that the content in Text, Text Input and TextArea?
<@U04UQ8CTT32> yup, we are looking to add that to code samples. Would you be open to a 15 min call to talk about more sample apps with <@U05KNCMAE7N>?

Hi <@U05D3US2RRB> :wave:,

A couple questions so I can help debug this:
• Is this happening when you run the extensions locally with `hs project dev`?
• If so, when you are prompted to select a portal by `hs project dev`, does the portal id match the portal you are testing in?
The reason I ask is we have a known issue with a pending fix where you can run an extension locally and select a sandbox in the CLI, and navigate to your production portal in the browser and it will engage local dev mode, but cause issues with the serverless functions.
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> happy to help! Private message me and I’ll send you my calendar availability for next week
